code: @Test public void testLanguage() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived(6).     template.sendBody("direct:start", 3).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // START SNIPPET: e1     String script = URLEncoder.encode("request.body * 2", "UTF-8").     from("direct:start").to("language:groovy:" + script).to("mock:result"). // END SNIPPET: e1 }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             // START SNIPPET: e1             String script = URLEncoder.encode("request.body * 2", "UTF-8").             from("direct:start").to("language:groovy:" + script).to("mock:result").         // END SNIPPET: e1         }     }. }
